text: [[img:bullet_chs_corruption]][[/img]]The tribes of Albion have repelled the mark of Chaos but their lands have not. They have long lived in bitter harmony with the corrupting influence of Chaos.||[[img:bullet_dwf_underway]][[/img]]Completely rebuild the Waystones of Albion for powerful bonuses including unocking the unchosen Legendary Lord and to end the invasions of the Dark Emissaries forces once and for all!||[[img:bullet_nor_units]][[/img]]Aggressive infantry based roster with a variety of cavalry and monstrous units.
